title: Creating Campaign: Successfully create a Pic2Screen campaign
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager
And the user you logged in with has the permissions to create a Pic2Screen campaign
custom_steps:
When you log into campaign manager
And click on the 'New Campaign' button
And select 'Pic2Screen'
And fill out the form
And click the 'Create' button at the bottom
custom_expected: Then you will be taken to the campaign page of the new Pic2Screen

title: Creating Campaign: Attempt to create leaving 'Response Email' empty
custom_preconds:
Given you logged into campaign manager
And the user has permission to create Pic2Screen campaign
custom_steps:
When you log into campaign manager
And click the 'New Campaign' button
And select 'Pic2Screen'
And enter 'Campaign Name'
And leave the 'Response Email' field empty
And click 'Create'
custom_expected:
Then you will see an error
And a new campaign will not be created

title: Starting Campaign: Trying to start a second Pic2Screen campaign the same user
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager
And there is a Pic2Screen campaign that is already running
custom_steps:
When you log into campaign manager
And create a new Pic2Screen campaign
custom_expected:
Then on that second Pic2Screen campaign page you will not have the option to start
And instead of a start button you will see:

"You cannot start this Campaign because other Campaign(s): tobys royal pic2screen, is running and you cannot have two pic2Screen campaigns running at the same time."

title: Starting Campaign: Starting campaign from campaign page
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the ability to create a campaign
And there is pic2screen campaign either in the created or stopped state
And there is no other pic2screen campaign running
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the start button
And taps on the ok button on the confirmation page
And taps on click here
custom_expected:
Then the user will be brought back to the campaign page
And there will be a stop button
And there will be no start button
And there will be a new row in the campaign run summary
And the end date for the new row will be 'Running[View]' where view is clickable

title: Starting Campaign: Starting campaign from all campaigns page
custom_preconds: Given there is a pic2screen campaign that is either stopped or in a created state
custom_steps:
When the user taps the stopped or created button in the action column correlating to the voting campaign
And taps on 'Ok' on the confirmation page
And taps on the 'Close'
custom_expected: Then the user will see the stopped or created button turn into a green 'Running' button

title: Testing Campaign: Verify picture sent via email can be processed properly
custom_preconds:
Given you logged into campaign manager
And there is a pic2screen campaign active
And you have a external email address
And have a picture to email
And have the pictoscreen air app that will verify approved pictures
custom_steps:
When you attach a picture to an email 
And send that email to 'qa@reds.mlb.com'
And log into campaign manager using qauser6/qapass6
And click on 'augie test' campaign
And click 'view inbox'
And select the radio next to the picture you sent
And click approve
And click ok to confirm
custom_expected:
Then when you launch the pictoscreen air app that verifies what was approved is retrievable
And click start sequence
And you will see your picture
And you will not see your pictures in the new tab in the inbox
And you will see the selected picture in the approved tab in the inbox

title: Testing Campaign: Rotating Picture
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager
And there is a pic2screen campaign
And there is a picture in the inbox
custom_steps:
When you log into campaign manager
And click on the pic2screen campaign
And click on inbox
And select the radio box next to a picture
And hit the 'Rotation Angle' drop down 180
And hit rotate button
custom_expected: Then the selected picture will rotate 180 degrees

title: Testing Campaign: Approving multiple pictures
custom_preconds:
Given you logged into campaign manager
And there is a pic2screen campaign
And there are multiple pictures in the inbox
custom_steps:
When you log into campaign manager
And click on the pic2screen campaign
And click on inbox
And click the radio boxes next to 2 pictures
And click approve
And click ok to confirm
custom_expected:
Then the 2 selected pictures should be approved
And when you click on the approved tab in inbox you will see the 2 pictures
And the 2 pictures will not be in the new tab in the inbox

title: Testing Campaign: Deleting Picture
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager
And there is a pic2screen campaign
And there is an approved picture in that campaign
custom_steps:
When you log into campaign manager
And click on the pic2screen campaign
And click on inbox
And click on approved tab
And click the radio button next to a picture
And click the delete button
custom_expected:
Then the selected picture will no longer be in the approved tab
And will be in the deleted tab

title: Testing Campaign: Undeleting Picture
custom_preconds:
Given you are logged into campaign manager
And there is a pic2sceen campaign
And there is a picture in the deleted tab in the inbox
custom_steps:
When you are logged into campaign manager
And click on the pic2screen campaign
And click on inbox
And click on deleted tab
And click the radio button next to the picture
And click undelete button
And click ok to confirm
custom_expected:
Then the selected picture will not be in the deleted tab
And the undeleted picture will then be in the new tab

title: Cloning Campaign: Clone a Pic2Screen campaign
custom_preconds:
Given the user has the ability to create a pic2screen campaign
And there is a pic2screen campaign created
And the user is on the campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the clone button
And enters new campaign name
And taps on the create button
custom_expected: Then the user will be brought to the campaign page of the new pic2screen campaign

title: Stopping Campaign: Stopping pic2screen campaign from the all campaigns page
custom_preconds:
Given the user logs into an account with an active pic2screen campaign
And the user is on the main campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the 'Running' button correlating to the active voting campaign
And taps on 'Ok' on the confirmation page
And taps on 'close'
custom_expected:
Then the pic2screen campaign should be stopped
And the button should go from running to stopped.

title: Stopping Campaign: Stopping pic2screen campaign from campaign page
custom_preconds:
Given the user logs into an account where there is an active voting campaign
And the user is on that campaign page
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the stop button in the stop the campaign section
And taps on ok on the confirmation page
And taps on click here to return to the campaign page
custom_expected:
Then the user will be returned to the campaign page
And there will no longer be a stop the campaign section
And there will now be a start the campaign section with a start button
And in the run campaign summary section the will be an end date for all runs

title: Expiring Campaign: Expire campaign from campaign page - running campaign
custom_preconds:
Given there is a pic2screen campaign that is active
And the user is on the campaign page
custom_steps: When the user taps on the expire button
custom_expected:
Then the user will be brought to an error page that says:
"This campaign is currently running and cannot be expired."

title: Expiring Campaign: Expire campaign from campaign page - stopped campaign
custom_preconds:
Given there is a voting campaign that is stopped
And the user is on the campaign page
And the campaign is in a stopped state
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the expire button
And taps on the ok button on the confirmation page
And taps on the click here to return home
custom_expected:
Then the user will be brought back to the main campaign dashboard
And the expired campaign will be hidden by default
